reviews.review_text: The only thing I don't like, but it's just a matter of getting used to it, is that it doesn't lean back like other chairs. you have to manually release the back for it to recline. The back reclines while the seat stays stationary. other than that, it's very comfortable and well built for a big guy like me. (260 lbs). I'm not sure if I'll ever truly use the footrest, but it works.

We got this for a 12 year old son for Christmas. It was annoying to put together, but not impossible. He enjoys it and his friends also love the chair as well. We had to use a little WD-40 to get the foot rest to slide in and out smoothly but other than that it works pretty well right out the box (after you assemble it of course).

Love chair has been great, 6 months of daily use and still looks brand new. Only thing that bothers me is if you sit down hard, the seat cushion makes a very loud "poof" sound. Is there a way to get rid of the air that gets trapped inside and forced out when I sit?

reviews.title: Comfy Chair
reviews.review_text: I love this chair, the colors and comfort. I love it for the lumbar cushion to, as I have a bad lower back. I love the fact that it reclines and has a built in foot rest.I also like the head / neck support cushion. Very easy assembly. I did it myself in about an hour.

reviews.title: Nice chair, but broken straight out of the box
reviews.review_text: Assembly was straightforward however the zipper for the headrest was broken and off track straight out of the box. After spending so much time putting the chair together it wasn't worth disassembling and exchanging the chair. We ended up just making it work

reviews.title: Price doesn't match quality
reviews.review_text: Seat is not cushioned very well. I don't play for long periods and after about 10 mins I start to get uncomfortable. The pillows and foot rest help a little but the chair doesn't seem to be designed as well as others.

reviews.title: GTRACING GTWD-200 Ergonomic Gaming Chair with Adju
reviews.review_text: My item and the box it was in upon pickup at our local Walmart were damaged; the pillow clip in the back of the chair was busted and nonfunctional. I would think for the purchase all parts would be intact. We don't want to go through the whole return business, as this is an inconvenience to us. We will keep it; we just feel maybe a partial discount would suffice for the broken, unusable product area.

reviews.title: Please Read Before You Buy!!
reviews.review_text: This is by far the most unnecessarily difficult thing I've ever put together!! 1. There were NO INSTRUCTIONS included with the item. 2. I called Customer Service Support to ask about instructions and all they said was ‚Äúfind your model number and put it into YouTube to see if you can find the instruction video‚Ä¶if that doesn't work we can send you a PDF to your email but it'll take 2 hrs, if that doesn't work for you, you can just take it back to Walmart‚Äù after I had already literally took everything out of the box and the plastic off of everything!! They said take it back like this was a book or something smh‚Ä¶I will NEVER buy anything from GTRacing again, their customer service sucks and their design sucks! STAY AWAY and do not spend your money on them! Trust me on this one!! Extremely disappointed!! Whoever makes the decisions for this ‚Äúcompany‚Äù is an idiot!

reviews.title: horrible
reviews.review_text: driver lied about it being delivered so they were trying to seal it then when it finally came it came broken and box broken , called for a refund didn't want to help me with that so now i have a broken chair

For a short person or small person i might recommend this chair. At 6 foot im not only too tall for the chair but too heavy as well i guess. They skimped pretty hard on any support for the butt cushions even though i am in the recommend weight according to their specifications. the pull out foot rest is cool and all but at 6 foot the foot rest is really a calf rest and the cushioning is weak there as well so it digs in and leaves you sore. Just overall not enough support where it counts.

reviews.title: Affordable gaming chair for gaming or just working
reviews.review_text: Actuallly a really nice and comfortable chair for the money. The leg rest is kinda flimsy for an adult male, but I will likely never use it. It doesn't come out smoothly and it bends under the weight of my legs. For a young child or a teenager of average build, it should be fine. Seat has good cusioning. Armwrests are nice. Wheels are way better than my last gaming chair. Took 20-30 minutes to put together. Not difficult, but a handful of bolts to be hand tightened with the included tools. Glad I got the new chair. Probably won't last for more than a few years, but for the money I spent, that's acceptable.

reviews.title: Comfortableeeee!
reviews.review_text: My son looooooves his chair! I love that reclines so far back! It's so comfortable, he's fallen asleep in it so many times after gaming, even prefers to sleep in it over his bed sometimes. The only thing is I wish there was a lever to release the foot rest, instead of having to pull it out bc sometimes it gets stuck. But yes, all in all 10/10 highly recommend lol.

reviews.title: so far so good
reviews.review_text: it didn't take my husband much time at all, maybe 30 ish minutes, to put it together. it rolls smooth and lays back easily. its a little stiff but its new so thats ok.

easy to assembly. quality is okay. The seat is very firm, and I had to put a cushion seat just to get comfortable. those two cushions for neck and back are very firm, and if you stay in the chair for a long period of time, then the back and neck are starting to wear down. Would be nicer if the foam was not as firm as it is.

reviews.title: Great chair!
reviews.review_text: Great chair. My son loves it. He's 9 years old and he fits perfectly in the chair. Only thing is the feet rest installation wasn't right in the instructions. The screw had to go in the right side when facing the chair. Otherwise, putting it together was easy and fast.

reviews.title: Decent but splurge on something better
reviews.review_text: The chair is definitely more comfortable than the cheap one i had before, but there are a couple noteable flaws. the pillow for your back is much too thick for anyones spine unless you have scoliosis, its just uncomfortable and we had to take it off. Second, the "foot rest" only extends about a foot, making it effectively a knee rest with your feet dangling off with no support.

reviews.title: Waste of money poorly made
reviews.review_text: One arm will not stay on no matter what I do. The screw is fine but it's the default Is what I'm screwing into, poorly made. Footrest complete disaster. This chair is horrible. I had my coworker (maintenance)assemble it. He assembles everything at my place of work. Biggest waste of money Cheap poorly made product

reviews.title: Great chair, no assembly instructions
reviews.review_text: I really love this chair. The size is perfect; it feels wide and tall while the chair itself is slender. The reason I am not giving this chair 5 stars is that there were no assembly instructions included. The website also did not provide instructions. Luckily, youtube has it all. I would still recommend the chair.

reviews.title: Really all around great chair
reviews.review_text: I bought this for my 10 year old and he absolutely loves it. Fully adjustable, from many aspects, foot rest, back rest, next rest, lumbar support. My child loves it. It's great as a chair for an adult too. Honestly, his chair isbetter than my chair :)

reviews.title: Sweet Buy!!
reviews.review_text: Shipping was prompt and the price was nice. I bought this chair as a helpful tool for recovering from my ACL surgery, as I needed the footrest for leg elevation. It was fairly easy to assemble and seems pretty sturdy. Came with extra parts, which weren't needed, but handy to have. Just wish it had come with an extra caster, but they seem to be standard ones, so easily replaced if needed. Over all, a pretty good buy. Recommended, especially for the price.

reviews.title: Good for the meantime
reviews.review_text: Generally speaking, the quality of the chair is ‚Äúgood for the meantime‚Äù. It is a comfortable chair and rolls really nicely. The chair functions overall, as intended. The main issues I have with the chair are the arms of the chair and the foot rest. The overall design of the foot rest makes pulling out the foot rest easy but, extremely difficult to put back. You have to wiggle pretty aggressively to return it back out of the way. Furthermore the arm rests come with covers that cover the nails to tighten the arms, makes the design look sleek, however dot com, it makes it more challenging to tighten the arms as frequently as it needs. That all being said, my cats enjoy stealing it from me and it was comfortable for the meantime but I had to replace it already with something a little better and actually cheaper!

reviews.title: Surprised.
reviews.review_text: It went together pretty easy. I have had it a few months and it is still as comfy as day one! I did not expect this quality of product for the price. I was looking for a chair to "make due" but ended up getting a good chair that might last! Is it a secret labs chair? No. Is it worth $100ish bucks? Heck yes!

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: I ordered this chair for work as an upgrade to the one I had prior. If you are questioning whether or not to get it, GET IT! I love my new chair! My boyfriend had to help me with the assembly because the parts were a bit heavy. Which ultimately gives the chair a sturdy and quality finish! I can sit up with lumbar and neck support during a meeting or I can recline, put my feet up and watch a movie in my office. And the color! 10/10 I would recommend!

reviews.title: It's worth the money and very comfortable!
reviews.review_text: My cheap gaming chair failed at my place at the beach that I purchased in 2020 and I needed a replacement ASAP since I was only there for a week. Amazon, Best Buy had nothing that could be shipped to me in a short amount of time. So, I checked Walmart, and they had the GTRACING GTWD-200 gaming chair in-stock and could pick it up that day. The chair costs approximately $125.00 including tax; excellent value. It took approximately 30 to 35 minutes to assemble, and it comes with the tool to assemble the chair, so no extra tools needed. It is very comfortable and is great for big guys. The chair has plenty of room to sit comfortably and has multiple adjustments to reach your comfort zone. Overall, great value for the money and I recommend.
The price is better then expected, The quaility is better then expected, Walmart next day delivery service better then expected. 5 stars all the way. THANK YOU

reviews.title: BUY A DIFFERENT BRAND THESE BREAK ALL THE TIME
reviews.review_text: I wouldnt reccomend because we have bought 4 chairs in 10 years from GT RACING brand and they always fall apart this last chair we bought our 8 years old broke already. its always the arms then the leather then the stuffing

reviews.title: Good quality but not the most comfortable
reviews.review_text: I was expecting the chair to be more comfortable and sturdy when I got it. It is nice quality and has a nice appearance. Assembly wasn't super difficult. Overall I'd recommend.
This chair is big, in a good way. The color is what it appears to be in the site. It seems to be very durable. Everything works like it should. Overall a good deal.

If I could put zero stars I would but you all will not let me. I packed the box with the chair in it up three flights of stairs. I started to put the chair together and when I thought I was almost done because all I needed to do was put the arm rest on . I noticed that it was missing the screws to put the arm rest on. I contacted my local Walmart and was informed that I would need to bring the chair back . Are you kidding me . I was not about to take the chair apart then drag it back down 3 flights of stairs for just some missing screws. I asked did they have any and if I could come get them . I was told that I would have to pay for the screws. Never again!!!!!!!

The colors are great, but assembly was a little hard as everything is not labeled and the pictures are hard to follow. We will see how it goes as i work from home and this chair will get use 8 hours a day. i plan on buying my husband one if this one lasts.

reviews.title: Great First Gaming Chair
reviews.review_text: I bought this chair for my son to replace his old chair. This year was a great upgrade from the simple chair that he had. this is a great first gaming chair for anyone who needs a chair in the gaming world. I know that there are better chairs out there. But you have to start somewhere. This is where I started for my son. Not a bad place to start if this is you.

reviews.title: Great for this price
reviews.review_text: This is a 4 to 5 star chair FOR THIS PRICE. This is an absurd price for a chair this reasonable. I've only owned it for about a month but it has shown 0 sign of slowing down. - easy to assemble - good quality for this price compared to competitors - the footrest is strong enough to last a little but don't expect something durable especially if you're weighing over 190lbs. - as with most 'gaming' chairs, headrest is basically useless as well as the lumbar support but it's not uncomfortable by any means. - It doesn't lean back that far so beware, but I suspect this is to help keep it durable for longer. - Hard to beat at this price, it's about as comfortable as some much more expensive chairs but it's certainly not winning points on overall material quality in comparison. - Great beginner chair IMO or if you need something reasonably comfortable for cheap

This chair is great, but I for some reason just cannot get the armrests on properly. Maybe I used a wrong piece somewhere, but they just don'r screw in well. One is worse than the other and it seems once I have it screwed in to place about 1/2 way, it's like the screw or something is stripped so it just turns and turns and goes no where, and if too much pressure is put onto the armrest it pops out.

reviews.title: Honest Review of a Everyday Consumer
reviews.review_text: Just got this chair for my good friend before her trip, so I built it myself and honestly the building itself was way to complicated however for the price it was more then fair. The building material was extra durable and felt like the chair will last and the cushion on it was so good, I fell asleep on it sitting up with no pain. I'm way over weight and I was able sit and it had a lot of comfort. 10/10 would have definitely got one myself if I needed a chair.

reviews.title: Good chair for the price
reviews.review_text: Putting it together was a breeze, like, half an hour. But, I can see how it might be tough for some people. The chair's comfy for me. Though, I don't sit in it for ages.

reviews.title: Buy it!
reviews.review_text: Tried plenty of ‚Äúgaming‚Äù chairs under $200 and this is the best one I've used. Not perfect bc nothing is but for under $160 this is the closest to perfect you'll get.

reviews.title: LOVE IT!
reviews.review_text: The chair is so pretty and much larger than I thought! Lots of thigh room and it's not too bad assembly wise!! The foot rest photo may have the wrong way on the paper the screw goes on the right side underneath not by the recline mechanism.

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.review_text: Best low tier chair available it seems. Not super comfortable and wears out after a year or two, but not uncomfortable and it does have plenty of support options.

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.review_text: Product was easy to set up. I also felt like the quality was really well built with good comfort. The best part I found was the hand rest. They were soft unlike hard plastic we find in most of them

Very comfortable chair. So comfortable I've found my son sleeping on it on several occasions. Only drawback is not being able to adjust armrests as they're part of the reclining feature. Still, it's a solid 4.
Its a solid chair. The covering isn't the GREATEST but its a value chair and cats can be rough on the vinyl covering anyway. All together its really a great chair for the price.

reviews.title: waste of money
reviews.review_text: purchased this chair tonight and broight it home. opened the box to assemble it and the legs dont fit into the base. it was a toral waste of money. will be returning this tomorrow

reviews.title: Solid chair.
reviews.review_text: Only minor issues with assembly, but overall a solid buy. My son uses it every day, and his only complaint is the pull out foot rest is too short to actually use and be comfortable.
Excellent chair especially for the price. Very sturdy and comfortable. I use another pillow on the footrest for added comfort. It also looks really good.

For the price this things great. If you weigh over 200 pounds I would not recommend, but other than that. Tbh I almost can sleep on it, but like I said for the price it's amazing and I got it the next day!

I've bought two of these in the past This is the third two of them came with ripped vinyl and one had four missing screws . used screws from old one. bottom vinyl bore down and ripped off bottom within 3 months

reviews.title: I love this chair.
reviews.review_text: This chair is easy to put together and very comfortable. My son loves it as well. It's great for my back. I can recline and lay back easily. It also looks very nice in person.

reviews.title: Comfortable
reviews.review_text: I played a game on my laptop in this chair for about 5 hrs lol and wasn't sore from sitting for so long. Definitely worth the money wish I would of got a chair like this a long time ago.

reviews.title: Red Gaming Chair
reviews.review_text: A chair that's easy to build, aesthetically pleasing to look at and is as comfy as it looks?‚Ä¶.10/10. I bought this for my boyfriend. We built it in an hour and he loves it!

reviews.title: Great chair for decent price!
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer: I am a current Walmart Associate! The ease of assembly is great- all parts were included and I didn't need any additional tools- all were included with the chair and its hardware! The only issue I had was getting the wheels on, but I'm not the strongest person and could find someone to help with that. Everything else I could do myself. Both me and my mom love the chair and its ability to recline.

reviews.title: Very comfortable and sturdy
reviews.review_text: So comfortable and surest! My last chair collapsed on me üòµ‚Äçüí´ and I needed a new one asap. Always wanted a gamer like desk chair so it was the perfect opportunity to get one. Assembly maybe took 30 minutes. Love the lumbar support pillow. Overall I'm happy with the purchase.

reviews.title: I'm in love
reviews.review_text: I love this chair, I actually got it for my boyfriend for Christmas and he's also in love . I'm going to have to get myself one! Assembly was easy enough, we had fun putting it together. It's very sturdy and the leg rest is amazing! Being able to pull the leg rest under the chair is perfect. Overall great chair!

reviews.title: Comfy chair
reviews.review_text: It's a great entry-level gaming chair, like the appearance, value, and ease of assembly of the chair. The ergonomic design provides exceptional lumbar support, uality. I love that it reclines and supports my back and also my neck. Height adjusting of the seat and arm rests works well. The fabric isn't really leather, more of a plastic type covering over foam.

i could give a honest review butnits gmgardvwhennyoubdont get half the parts and none of the hardware to assemble this major mistake i want to receive a refund without wasting time and money try to deal with this store if inwas store or manufacturer o would rather thrown the parts that were in there in the the teash and letnthe customer get something out of the deal like a laugh or something this us insane

reviews.title: Perfect alternative to ‚Äúbetter‚Äù gaming chairs
reviews.review_text: Obviously you're still putting something together so you need a day to build this and have a couple tools with you, but it's completely worth it, I've had it for almost half a year now and it has really no wear and tear on it. If you're looking for a gaming chair and don't want to cheap out but the ‚Äúbetter‚Äù ones are way too expensive, this is a great choice.

reviews.title: Great gaming chair!
reviews.review_text: Assembly of this was so easy and fast. the only thing to note to at the end with the footrest, it made no sense bc it wouldnt go under the chair as in the pics. then i realized we had to remove the screws and flip it upside down before installing that last part. Otherwise its great %26 matches his desk from last xmas perfectly.

reviews.title: Expensive, lacking in comparison to other models
reviews.review_text: Son has the same brand in a different style and wants to return this one and repurchase previous style. Says this one isn't as supportive and has to add pillows for support. Not something you would think a twenty something yr old would need to do esp for a $100 gaming chair.

after two days of use the armrests are already dented in from my forearms/elbows and its now started making writd noises when i move some or adjust myself in the chair. (not the wheels). i didnt havr much expectation for this chair but it definitely but after two days and its already acting up im disapointed. i did order it and got it delivered the same day so theres that.

I rated the product highly due to the fast delivery and excellent quality of the office chair. However, I found the prices in the furniture section to be a bit on the higher side. Overall, the shopping experience was smooth and efficient, making it easy to order what I needed.

reviews.title: comfort
reviews.review_text: this is the third chair l have bought , l gave one to my daughter. l have one at my computer and the last one l have at my kitchen table .l am elderly and this chair supports my back , all round just a very comfortable chair , great value for your money

reviews.title: Good Quality Gaming Chair
reviews.review_text: Purchased for my teen son for Christmas. He assembled it and everything went well, except for a bent piece of the mechanism. Contacted the manufacturer and emailed a few pictures and 2 weeks later we received the replacement piece. Good experience, reliable company. This is the 2nd chair I've purchased from Walmart now. There are many other variations and manufacturers, but some of those the vinyl separated. This one I purchased the 3 year extended warranty. I hope we don't need to use it though.

reviews.title: Saw the color and immediately fell in love
reviews.review_text: I love this chair my husband has one first for his music studio, then I brought one for my son for his gaming room but the black and white ones, then I saw this color immediately fell I love because my whole room is pink everything. Only advice I can give you be careful wearing jeans or certain ringtone belts if wearing your pants low because it will ruin your leather.

Love this chair! I bought it for my bf specifically for gaming but i also use it for reading and watching tv. It is super comfortable and has different settings so you can sit different ways. It doesnt take up too much space either which is nice. It shipped fast with no broken parts. It is a bit of work to put together and I recommend using 2 people to assemble because its awkward. Other than that it is perfect and I highly recommend it!

reviews.title: don't buy
reviews.review_text: the part that slides the foot rest in and out is not functional. it is so cheaply made that not only does it not really slide, it does not stay in the stored position. The chair itself is extremely stiff and uncomfortable. like hard plastic, no give to the padding.

reviews.title: Buy it
reviews.review_text: His computer chair really changed the look of my computer set up and brought it together. I can't recommend it enough. Don't spend five $600 on a namebrand chair. The quality of this chair will last you at least 34 years and is definitely worth the money.

reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
reviews.review_text: I tried (emphasis on tried) to purchase this chair for my son. He is adept in assembling all kinds of things. The chair is so poorly made that it could NOT be assembled. The parts did NOT fit. The chair cylinder did not fit the base or the bottom of the chair. DO NOT BUY, IT'S A WASTE OF MONEY.

I should have paid closer to other reviews of this product. The design for installing the arms on this chair is really flawed. Not even an hour after assembling one of the arms felt loose. Under further inspection it had to do with the ‚Äúbolt‚Äù out the one side that you would screw into. The bolt came loose and when unzipped the cover my husband discovered the weld broke. He was able to sort of fix by drilling a hole in the metal piece and put an additional bolt to anchor. The look of the chair is nice and the features offered are good but another issue is the reclining feature doesn't seem ‚Äústable‚Äù. What I mean is that if you even slightly lean back the chair will keep reclining. Just beware.

High quality, looks awesome, super comfortable, and way easier to put together than the reviews said. I bought two and put them together in 20 minutes each. As for the foot rest, you have to make sure the slides are straight and slides like butter. Plan on buying 5 more for each of my kids.

reviews.title: Good packaging and directions
reviews.review_text: This was not hard to put together with my 14 year old son. The packaging for the screws is well labeled, and if you are familiar with IKEA directions, this is similar. My son is of average height and weight and finds it comfortable. I was very hesitant, but do recommend!

My son loves this chair, especially the footrest, and has even fallen asleep in it some nights. I was able to assemble it in around 15 minutes, and all the hardware was clearly labeled. Definitely a winner, and I definitely recommend this chair to anyone!

reviews.title: Great chair !!
reviews.review_text: The first thing that struck me was the sleek, modern design. The black and red color scheme gives it a professional yet edgy look, and the premium PU leather feels durable and comfortable. The stitching is flawless, adding a touch of class that makes it stand out compared to other gaming chairs in this price range.

reviews.title: It Leans To One Side
reviews.review_text: The chair would be great if it did not lean to the left. The seat leans and you can feel your weight being shifted to the front left corner. The back of the chair also leans down to the left (when sitting or the right if you are standing in front of it). You can see in the photo how the bottom of the back touches the seat on one side and it doesn't do that on the other. It was fairly easy to assemble and I had assistance so it took about 45 mins to assemble with care. If the chair did not lean to one side, I'm sure it would be a great chair. But right now my chair is not ergonomically positioned which is the reason I purchased it therefore, I cannot currently recommend this product. I am looking for another chair.

reviews.title: Good for The Buck
reviews.review_text: Gifted this to my husband and he enjoys the comfort and ease of use. The price and availability was great for my needs. It was super easy to watch him set it up, I read the instructions to him as he assembled. He finds it recommendable to his friends, I believe one of them purchased this as well after the recommendation , I like to relax on it occasionally too.

reviews.title: Great desk chair!
reviews.review_text: This is a SOLID chair that is well made and comes with easy-to-follow instructions. The packaging even includes designated extra screws. I am not using the chair for gaming, but for my work-from-home desk. Long hours of sitting on a regular desk chair was torture for my back. This chair is more promising.

reviews.title: Very Narrow and Extremely Uncomfortable
reviews.review_text: I bought a blue one because my son has the white %26 black one. For $130 this chair is HORRIBLE. The blue was extremely narrow compared to my sons white n black one.. It tore into my hips and legs, hurt my back and bum, no lumbar support and extremely hard on the sides and tooo firm overall. Since I put the box out for recycling, I cannot return it. Now I am stuck with it and loss of money. So it just sits in the back room, which I will probably just give it away to someone's less fortunate child to make his or her day. Never again will make another purchase from GTRacing.. Nick Capella

reviews.title: Love the chair great price
reviews.review_text: I started working at home and I'm at my desk for long days. My grandson suggested I get this gaming chair. I love it because it has a high back and a neck and lumbar cushion. It's firm but comfy. I use a memory foam cushion for the seat. Love it. Great chair.

reviews.title: Great chair with some shortcomings
reviews.review_text: Pros: It's a great chair, comfortable, and supportive. It raises higher than other chairs I've had and stays lifted. I don't slide off when reclining. It looks nice and fits well behind my desk. Cons: The arms aren't adjustable and not in the best place for my body size, but they're not terrible. The paddles for adjusting the recline is a bit out of reach, so I keep grabbing the one that lowers me down instead. Wish it was a bit closer to the front. Attaching the lumbar and head pillows was a bit of a pain and don't adjust as well as I'd like. The straps are cheaply made so it'll probably snap off eventually. I had to use another pillow for lumbar as the one it came with isn't great. Overall though I like the chair and have less back problems now compared to my old chairs.

reviews.title: Highly recommend this chair!
reviews.review_text: Here's a review of the gaming chair from my personal experience: I recently upgraded my gaming setup with the GTRACING gaming chair, and honestly, it's been a game-changer for me. As someone who spends hours gaming, working, or just chilling at my desk, comfort is a huge deal. This chair nails it with its adjustable pillows that perfectly support my neck and back‚Äîno more post-session aches for me! The upholstered cushion is super comfy, making those extended gaming sessions feel like a breeze. What I absolutely love is the ergonomic footrest and the reclining feature that allows me to kick back and relax in style. It's not just about comfort; this chair makes my gaming space look more modern and sleek. It's sturdy too, handling up to 290 pounds with ease, and the customizable features like seat height, headrest, and lumbar pillow adjustments are top-notch. I can tweak everything to fit just right, which is a big plus. Overall, investing in this chair was a smart move. It's enhanced my gaming experience significantly and also doubled up as a comfy spot for work. Highly recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade their seating!

reviews.title: Perfect %26 Comfy for a Teenager
reviews.review_text: Super cute and perfect for my teenager who loves to play video games all night on weekends. I did not want to buy a fancy, expensive chair, so this one was perfect! The color blue was perfect for my son's blue %26 gray bedroom. The only thing was that I wasn't present when it arrived and it took him a little while to put it together. I recommend two people to assemble.

reviews.title: Excellent choice
reviews.review_text: I ordered online without actually sitting in it, relying on the reviews posted. I am very pleased with the results of this chair. I like the adjustments that can be made especially with regards to the leaning back adjusting. As far as the ease of assembly, it is detailed and took some time ( one hour), but all parts are clearly marked and well packaged, needing only the provided enclosed tool for all assembly. I have had this chair for over a week now and would recommend it.

reviews.title: I'm very happy with it.
reviews.review_text: This is a basic "gaming chair". It was exactly as expected. The padding and cushions (lumbar and cervical) make the chair very comfortable to sit in. I'm very happy with it. Assembly was relatively easy. And it comes with all necessary tools. The small parts (screws, etc.) are in a labeled blister pack that coordinates with the instructions. All parts are labeled. II would buy again.

reviews.title: Good chair for the right price.
reviews.review_text: I am 6'1", 250lbs and I can sit comfortably in this chair. I'm probably pushing the limit of what it can handle, but it's doing well so far. It took an hour to construct and the parts and instructions were clear and well packaged. I hope the chair lasts a few years.

reviews.title: Definite Great Product!
reviews.review_text: My wife has severe arthritis in her hips %26 back. We had trouble finding a comfortable chair for her to use at our dining room table. The CNA that cares for my wife, while I'm at work, suggested I look into a gaming chair for her. I researched %26 read reviews from several companies. So we purchased this chair, feeling it was the best fit for my wife. We were not disappointed! This chair is perfect! The cushions are comfortable %26 the padded arm rests %26 lumbar support %26 neck pillows are a big plus ! My wife loves this chair! She can finally sit without pain while eating a meal. I liked it so well, that I bought a chair for myself, in black. I love my chair too. I like the height adjustment %26 reclining feature, alot ! Even our CNA loves this chair, that is here during the day! The price was very reasonable, very well constructed, easy to assemble. We recommend this chair!

reviews.title: Great Chair for Casual or Competitive Gaming
reviews.review_text: I've had it for about 6 months now and it's still feels brand new. Took me less than 20 min to put together so that's a plus for me. Overall it's really comfortable and you can adjust/ lock the back in position. Great for sitting straight up or leaning back a little bit (or all the way back). It's sturdy so either option and you still feel well supported.

There are some things I would have changed with the design. The foot rest is rather awkward as it folds back into the chair upside down. Also, it is actually not a foot rest but more of a place to rest your thighs as it does not extend to the feet, which is what a foot rest should do. The arm rests should be adjustable upwards to actually make contact with the elbows. Currently, they sit too low if you're working at a desk and provide no real purpose.

reviews.title: Better than my expectation
reviews.review_text: Literally the best chair l've purchased. Comfortable. Great back support. Good quality material. Easy to build. I'm 31 years old and spend a lot of time sitting down for being on the computer a lot. Several hours of working in and gaming in. Even fell asleep in it. No back pain. I had the best use experince with this one and it doesnt disapoint with comfort.

reviews.title: 4 ¬Ω star chair
reviews.review_text: the three flaws i have is that the head pillow doesn't stay up or tight and lumbar support pillow the straps go up the chair you can feel the straps on your back. The last flaw is the recline lever is away short and tucked into far making hard to reach and adjust while sitting. It could have used more padding in the seat. My bad the footrest is 100% garbage its to short and not supported strong enough. other than that good chair for beginners or someone on a budget

reviews.title: wouldnt recommend
reviews.review_text: I like the idea of footrest and weist support. The chair looked like it would meet my expectations since I spend most of my time on my computer. I wanted to be comfortable and have some flexibility to stretch. I enjoyed setting up the chair; the instructions were clear. It felt like a puzzle. However, the quality of the material is not what I expected. The leather looks cheap, and I dont think it is durable. The color of the black leather is different for each part, which also makes it look cheap. The wheels don't feel safe; it gets off from adjusting myself to the table. It is not securely attached. The footrest also doesn't feel safe. like if I put in a little weight, it might actually cause me to lose balance, which will also push wheels out. Overall, I think the chair is not worth the money, and it is probably not even safe to use it.

reviews.title: Nice chair and really comfy! Well built
reviews.review_text: After reading tons and tons of reviews I finally settled on this one for my 15 year old 6'2" son who has a habit of leaning back in chairs and just went through a (bad) brand new one he got for Christmas from Walmart with super cruddy support bars in the lower back area that were not even properly welded. Literally just tack welded. Needless to say, that 4 month old chair is garbage now. Very flimsy and not well built. I set out on a search for a better built chair with better back support bracing and more comfortable. He spends alot of time in his chair for homeschooling and also gaming so I decided on this one and it has a very wide support bracing in the back area where teens have a habit of leaning back in the chair. Much better. I was pleased to see this. This chair is very comfortable and the back comes up nice and high and I love how the sides feel like they sort of wrap around your body and offer support. It's good and roomy and the wheels are nice and smooth and it came with a support pillow for your neck and low back. He put it together himself in about 20 minutes. Overall, I wouldn't hesitate to buy this chair again. Infact, I am about to purchase a second chair for my daughter who is also homeschooling and spends alot of time in a chair and needs a good comfortable chair and this is a great choice. I am big on reading reviews and found them extremely helpful for me when I was searching for this one so I hope this review helps someone else who is in search for a great chair.

reviews.title: Awesome chair
reviews.review_text: Awesome chair, i can now be comfortable while in class, i like to sit cross legged while in my chair and be comfortable.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: Excellent Chair, Very Comfortable, Assemble was easy to follow instruction. Would Recommend this chair.
Helps relax, back feels good, adjustable. Could not ask for a better chair. Works for homework and reading as well.
Definitely on the small size. Some parts were poorly designed. The footrest is an abomination. Parts are too small,pulling and pushing the foot rest back is almost impossible. Not worth the money

reviews.title: WFH Comfort
reviews.review_text: Surprisingly super comfortable. I got this to work from home 2 days a week. Definitely needed this for comfort. Beyond relaxing and even the ability to recline. Note: the instructions have the foot rest upside down, easy fix = slip it haha
The cover of the seat adjuster was cracked but still usable and one of the bolt holes came stripped. 3 bolts holding the chair in place. So far so good.
I bought this chair for work. I have a lot of back pain %26 this is so comfortable! Really nice looking too! I got the black trimmed in white. Excellent value.

reviews.title: Horrible product
reviews.review_text: Don't buy it it's a hassle to assemble and a screw keeps falling off. And manufacturers customer service the same quality. Don't waste your time and money with this chair and its company.
Even though it is a gaming chair it works well for my art/drafting table. Very comfortable. Offers many options for adjusting height, posture, and comfortable sitting.

reviews.title: üëç
reviews.review_text: Got mine on sale, about 45$ off. Looks good. Comfortable. I'm 6 foot, my heels dangle at the highest extent. Assembly takes a few minutes, follow the directions and you'll be fine. Don't waste money on the assembly option, do it yourself.

reviews.title: Great chair second time buying
reviews.review_text: This is my second one of these chairs honestly thinks it's perfect and I highly recommend it the other one I tried the arm rests were too low and to close together this one is perfect

reviews.title: Relax in comfort with this reclining gaming chair!
reviews.review_text: Have been looking for a decent chair to use in the man cave and this one hits the nail on the spot. Super comfy and the fact that it reclines with a extendable foot rest makes it a prefect chair to use.
I like the chair but when assembling one of the arms had a stripped part.Try calling custumer service and took 2 days to get through.And they ran me all over and treated me poorly.

reviews.title: Gaming chair
reviews.review_text: Man, I love this chair is very comfortable as well and I love the design in it. Definitely recommend anybody to grab this chair and for the price is not bad.

this chair is comfortable to sit in for long periods. I recent crushed 5 vetebrea in my lower back. So far its the only chair i can sit in comfortably for extended periods. Tje only thing I would change is to change out the caster to better ones.
Great chair for the price. Only issue I had was the foot stool not sliding in and out very well, but a spray of WD40 fixed that.

reviews.title: review
reviews.review_text: The chair was very easy to assemble and has been very durable. I have had the chair for months and there is no tears or rips. Great chair for office work and gaming.

reviews.title: gaming chair
reviews.review_text: I got this chair for my son, took a bit of time to put it together, but seems to be a good solid chair for the price. I didn't need any special tools for assembly, it came with everything needed. The chair looks good and my son likes it.

reviews.title: Great gaming chair
reviews.review_text: I bought this chair for my daughter, who happens to be a gamer and artist. She loves it, I love it. It's comfortable and it's easy to assemble (considering she did it herself). I highly recommend this product.

reviews.title: everything fits screws and all.
reviews.review_text: Easy to put together. Everything fits nicely if you know what you are doing. if you dont. it will still go together. You just need to be patient and keep going. Some of the screws seem like they dont fit, but they do.

reviews.title: 11 and 16 year olds approved
reviews.review_text: I bought this as part of the gaming setup for my youngest son (11). Now my 16yr old wants one. The assembly wasn't too bad I struggled a bit to get the arms on but eventually was able to make it work.
well,im in it a lot. so its wearing out. i tighten the bolts up on occasion, but actually good quality. id maybe like something a bit more comfy for my back. but i will shop with you ,of course!

reviews.title: Amazing chair for the price and very comfortable
reviews.review_text: Got this chair while on rollback so it was really worth the money and the assembly was very simple and straightforward. Nothing feels cheap or loose after putting together and is very comfortable.

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.review_text: Easy to put together, just didn't know how thin the foam is. Sat in it to do my computer work and it started to get really uncomfortable. Wouldn't recommend.

reviews.title: Solid build great value
reviews.review_text: All these budget gaming chairs are made from the same company before they get rebranded. This one is just fine and the rebranding and repackaging looks good. Chair should last you 3 to 5 years.
i purchased a chair prior as a gift . The recipient absolutely loves it, and I have made this ourchase for a gift as well. the product is above all expectations
Small pillow doesn't help like it should. Leg rest only works if you lean pretty far back. With the chair arms so far forward, can't sit criss-crossed.
This chair is very uncomfortable hard as a rock. You can't sit in it very long would not recommend this chair to anybody that's my opinion, and I said in a bunch of chairs in my life.

reviews.title: Better than expected
reviews.review_text: Well, first off, I liked how easy it was to assemble...only took about 20 minutes. Secondly, I am not a small person. At 6'1" 245lbs, I thought the chair would feel unsteady as I moved around in the seat...I was wrong, it feels really sturdy. Lastly, the chair is comfortable enough to sleep in. It reclines enough to sleep there intentionally if you wanted/needed to. The cushons and pillows are top-notch. I sit in this chair for hours with zero discomfort. I guess what Im saying is, if you're looking for a good chair for your office or Man-cave, do yourself a favor and get this one.

reviews.title: Great gaming chair
reviews.review_text: Besides the color where you can find online this game chair is great and plus you can try to take a nap on it but overall for gaming it's comfortable for your back great for when you're on relax watching a movie I give this a recommended purchase to anyone who wants to get a gaming chair

I bought this and put it together today, my only complaint is that the footrest bar/pad needs to be reversed. Layman's terms the fat part should face outwards in use and still rotates to a stow position. I don't know if mine came the wrong way, but if it does you can obviously fix it yourself.

reviews.title: Oh no zipper is broken!
reviews.review_text: Zipper is broken. Chair looks like it could be great but the zipper came broken and my grandson wants it so bad he's in tears. What a birthday from GiGi. I hope customer service can make it right without taking having to have his mother dissemble and ship it back. He is in the picture holding the chair so is mom won't take it a part to send it back!!!! Poor baby.

reviews.title: A Great Chair, Great Brand, Great Value
reviews.review_text: I've been using chairs made my GTRacing since before they were partnered with Walmart and I'm so glad that they're still around. They're good quality chairs with various options and color choices and they work for the "gamer" chair look while also offering some actual comfort for extended office use. The footrest is a nice little addition and for the price you really can't beat these chairs. Feels like I'm getting one of the $500 chairs for 1/4 that price.

reviews.title: Great Gaming Chair!
reviews.review_text: Easy to assemble with the included instructions! The only issue was the installation of the metal leg rest extensions into the plastic holders under the seat. The metal extensions would not slide into these plastic holders without some force. Instead, I put one drop of silicone and rubbed it around each metal leg end for easier installation and smoother operation!

It's a nice chair but not ideal for me. The lowest it will go is a normal height. I'm only 5'4 so at its lowest my feet still don't touch the ground. Not ideal for my desk that is lower. Also it does not budge or rock. Once you set the back, it has to stay there. You lock it and it won't budge and if unlocked, you just fall all the way back. Too shift for my liking. Also the foot rest is a pain or pull out and push away. It does not glide easy. Otherwise the chair is fine. I personally would not get it again.

Instructions had pictures so was fairly easy to assemble. The only confusing part of assembly was how to attach the lumbar support and headrest pillows securely. My son, who is not mechanicaly inclined, assembled it himself with very little help from me and was ecstatic once he sat in it and found out how comfortable it was. Would recommend to anyone who sits for hours playing games. Nice choice of colours to match most any theme.

reviews.title: Comfortable chair
reviews.review_text: This was so easy to put together at home. It's very comfortable and the cushion's are thick. My daughter (the one I purchased it for) likes the reclining feature with the foot rest. I am seriously thinking about buying one for my home office, because it's so comfortable.

reviews.title: Honest good gaming chair.
reviews.review_text: The assembly was simple to understand and husband didn't have much problems. He likes how comfortable the chair is and loves the footrest. He's a truck driver so he wanted somewhere to sit down and rest and play his video games after a long hard day. Best decision he has made!

reviews.title: Chair review
reviews.review_text: This gaming chair is the best value for money I could find. Despite being the cheapest option available, its quality is impressive and easily compares with some of the higher-end gaming chairs on the market. The materials feel durable and comfortable, providing great support during long gaming sessions. Additionally, the assembly process was a breeze, each step is straight forward and easy to follow, making it quick to set up. If you're looking for an affordable chair without sacrificing quality, this one is definitely worth considering. A good chair for a king

reviews.title: Good Chair
reviews.review_text: Received this chair as a gift. Assembly was easy with clear instructions. I have had this chair for a couple months. Overall it's a good chair. Padding of seat and arms are good for long days at the desk. I appreciate the adjustment levers for height and reclining. Also the foot rest feature. Wheels roll without any issues. I would recommend.

The small back pillow even has massage function. The assembly is very easy, instructions are very clear. Very pleased with the purchase.

My biggest problem with it that is causing me replace it after only a couple weeks of having it is the seat cushion if your a tall and bigger guy (I weigh 210) it is so unbearable uncomfortable it was actually causing my bottom to ache only after 1-2 hours not create comforts which is the purpose of a gaming chair would not recommend.

reviews.title: Pleas don't waste your money
reviews.review_text: OK, this thing is absolute garbage. I've already been an hour and a half to try to put this thing together but with how Janky every bit of it is I give up. The screws are too short to attach the seat to the part that attaches the seat to the hydraulic part.. so had to take the washer off and use all my weight to press down for the threads to catch.. the arm rest screw just spins in place. Like the female adapter is not attached to anything. I can't even un screw it it just spins in place.. It took 5 minutes to get the headrest cover zipped up. Honestly this chair is garbage. I'll be returning it asap and I still haven't finished assembling it

reviews.title: Great chair
reviews.review_text: Very comfortable. Easy installation. very sturdy. Can't go wrong . Buying another one for my daughter
At first was uncomfortable and can get cold during winter. But overall it's perfect. I be bout to fall asleep

reviews.title: great quality and comfortable.
reviews.review_text: love how comfortable the chair. Only suggestion is that the footrest come out further so people over 5' 7" could use it as intended.

reviews.title: Comfortable and well made chair
reviews.review_text: I work remote from home so I sit a lot during the day. Very comfortable chair. Only regret is not buying sooner.

reviews.title: Great Value
reviews.review_text: Easy to assemble and so much comfortable, you can spend hours playing, working, etc without noticing.
My boyfriend built it for me, but he'd say it is quite easy to put together. It holds up, it's good for a short term chair.

reviews.title: So comfortable!!!
reviews.review_text: Oh my Gosh, this chair is amazing. So comfortable, I dont want to get out of it. Don't hesitate, buy!! Good value.
Chair is comfortable but came with marks in head rest post of course already assembled so didn't bother w/ taking apart

reviews.title: Comfy chair
reviews.review_text: Easy to assemble. Only I don't like is the foot rest is a pain in the butt to pull out and push back in.
Arms don't stay screwed in, footrest bends very easily. I've had this chair for about 3 weeks and it's nothing but headaches

reviews.title: Good chair
reviews.review_text: better quality than expected for the price. Metal base wasnt expected at all. The seat is wider than expected also.

reviews.title: good buy
reviews.review_text: love the chair. easy assmebly. love that you can recline and put your feet up and have the lower back and headrest cushions

reviews.title: sleepy time
reviews.review_text: since I have had this chair i have fallen asleep many many times in it, not with my old chair and it had 45 settings.

reviews.title: Horrible, do NOT purchase!
reviews.review_text: The holes where the screw went in were all stripped inside. We were lucky enough to get 1 arm rest screwed in. Horrible purchase!

reviews.title: Gamer approved
reviews.review_text: My son loves this chair, seat is wider and softer than other chairs we have purchased. Great quality for the price.
Much better quality than I was expecting especially at the price. Easy to assemble and very comfortable, and Im 6'1" 232

reviews.title: Look somewhere else
reviews.review_text: The left side arm will not stay on, it's almost like it was never made for this chair, constantly falls off

reviews.title: Best gaming chair at a valued price
reviews.review_text: Veryy easy to put together, everything included. Very comfortable and affordable, would recommend for sure.

reviews.title: Good buy
reviews.review_text: Seems like a decent chair. My son loves it. The design of the leg rest could be improved. Hard to pull out and push back in.

reviews.title: Game day on!!!!
reviews.review_text: I'm happy that the price wasn't bad at all. I could afford more games for the player lol! Comfy n easy to setup man. Great buy

reviews.title: Worth the price
reviews.review_text: I got this chair for my husband for father's day. I ordered the blue accent one online because they only have white accent in store. It's not the best of the best, but it's great for the price.

reviews.title: get lost Grammarly stay really far away
reviews.review_text: gamer chair made in Vietnam, right side of seat connect underside had to be hammered in place as the weld was about 1/8 above level. on the plus side nice tall chair

reviews.title: Worth the buy!
reviews.review_text: I was honestly taken back by how easy this was to assemble! I'm a single mom of four and put it together in minutes! The leather is nice! Better quality than I expected for the price! And I plan on getting another for my daughter!
The first chair, the zippers were broken. I did have to go back to the store and get a new one, customer service was fast and got my refund and got the new chair quick.

reviews.title: Horrible waste of time
reviews.review_text: Horrible quality! Opened the box and the parts are the same size and it can't be put together. The leg that's supposed to go into the base is taller than the opening. No possible way to insert it.
the instructions about which hardware goes where is NOT accurate. But if you take your time and think your way through it, this chair rocks (pun intended). Buy it.

reviews.title: Awesome Chair
reviews.review_text: Great Chair, Easy to put together. Comfortable all day working and gaming. great functionality. Sturdy. My husband is 6ft 2in and plenty Comfortable and loves it. Buy it

reviews.title: Leg rest
reviews.review_text: My leg rest doesn't stay up I thought once you put you legs up it suppose to stay but I was told wrong it suppose to be already in position but it just hangs
Love It Love It Love it. The assemble instructions were easy to follow. My chair was assembled within an hour . It's comfy and sturdy. Highly recomend .

reviews.title: Just a good chair
reviews.review_text: It's a great chair for gaming. the assembly wasn't too difficult, the leather is nice. has a good height to it when fully extended up. definitely would recommend it.
As advertised. We love these computer desk chairs. They are comfortable and easy to assemble. I really like the footrest feature, but it could be a little more substantial.
I give it a 3 out of 10 as far as assembly. If you have lower back issues, this is not the chair for you. Other than that, it is a very comfortable chair

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.review_text: A tip for assembly lay the chair on its back when inserting the foot rest. Chair is noisy when you lean back and move. Chair is very comfortable and perfect in between squishy and firm.

reviews.title: Nice Chair!
reviews.review_text: Took about 30 minutes to put together. Instructions were easy to follow. It works well for what it is. Ordered the same one for work chair replacement.

reviews.title: Decent for the price
reviews.review_text: Okay so it's a very comfy chair, but the instructions on assembly could use a little work. Other than the time it took to put together it's honestly a nice chair.

reviews.title: Great chair
reviews.review_text: This is the most comfortable chair ever! The support is great and adjustable. I usually am uncomfortable in these types of chairs, because I am only 5 ft 1 inch, but this one feels great!

This gaming chair was easy to assemble, my 16 year old grandson put his and his sosters together easily..they are very nice and make your back feel amazing sitting on them I would highly recommend this gaming chair.
I haven't put it together yet however it has great reviews. My son wanted this specific color and I dropped the ball on ordering it in time. Was able to find it for a great price at Walmart.
Comfortable to sit on, nice height, nice foot rest wish it was a bit longer grandchild is tall, love the price but so far holding up good time will tell 1week in.
Received on time..... actually sooner than I expected.

reviews.title: definitely worth the buy
reviews.review_text: i got it for my boyfriend he loves it

reviews.title: Missing pieces
reviews.review_text: Ordered for same day delivery, opened box with major things missing.
My kids love it! We need to get a second one so they can each have one!
Love it, it is just what i needed for when i work on my diamond paintings
Everything was in the box. Price was extremely reasonable.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.review_text: Works great and easy to set up! Definitely recommend:)

reviews.title: don't buy
reviews.review_text: Like sitting on a plank of wood, no real arm support if at your desk.
Nice and wide! Super comfy and was easy to put together!
I love this chair super comfy you'll need 2 it's not fair if you the only person in it
Pieces did not go together Never got to assemble or use Esp since I could not return back to store

reviews.title: Perfect fit
reviews.review_text: A birthday gift worked out perfectly was easy to assemble!
For the big gamers this is perfect including the back support
Very comfortable and affordable. You get more than what you pay for.
this chair is so good that ive bought my son and dad one.
Its a comfortable chair especially for the price. The ergonomics is pretty spot on for my needs.

reviews.title: looks great
reviews.review_text: great looking, comfortable! average assembly time- directions could be better.
Missing wheels so that kind of sucks everything else great

reviews.title: broke almost immediately
reviews.review_text: broke almost immediately, only leans forward. could be a defective chair, who knows

reviews.title: Great Chair. Greater than any other chair!
reviews.review_text: This is probably one of the best chairs I've ever purchased

reviews.title: Extra energy for setup
reviews.review_text: The setup was time consuming.

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.review_text: Very comfy, I'm a tall guy recliner is great, simple to assemble
great product for the money and pretty easy to assemble
good chair for price, comfortable enough for long gaming sessions

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: It's heavy, and the parts are strong. The packing also is good. I tried to install it myself, but it was too heavy for me and I think I need my boyfriend to help, lol. It looks good.
never recived this chair and spoke with walmart about it they said i would get a refund and nothing so im 130 down the drain because they misplaced a package

reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
reviews.review_text: Box came with a warning paper stating that this package may not have enough screws contact the company with a phone number. There were not enough screws or the appropriate size screws.

reviews.title: Amazing chair, easy to assemble
reviews.review_text: This chair was very easy to assemble (I got it put together in about 10-15 minutes my fianc√©e thought it was 5hrs mind you he just woke up from a nap and he fell asleep shortly after I started putting the chair together lol), my fianc√©e loves it. Only complaint is that it squeaks when he reclines it. Overall it's perfect for his gaming in the evenings, he brags about it to all his buddies!

With the ability to recline and pull up a leg rest? Neck and lumbar support? Definitely a chair to be used in many areas of life (You can't really be taken seriously sitting in it in a professional environment) however for a gamer? All its missing is a chip and drink dispenser / holder for those late night gamer types... However, I personally don't need that.

reviews.title: Don't recommend at all
reviews.review_text: I was very excited for this chair after seeing it on the walmart display, it was fairly easy to put together until I got the arms part I dont know if they gave the wrong screws for that part but they were hard to screw in %26 ending up getting stripped now the arms just fall off so not very pleased with this purchase im glad I kept my old gaming chair with me.

reviews.title: sturdy and well-built
reviews.review_text: The chair feels sturdy and well-built, with high-quality materials that show no signs of wear or tear after months of use. The height adjustment feature caters to users of various heights. Beside, The generous padding and included lumbar and neck pillows offer excellent support.

reviews.title: Nice gaming chair !
reviews.review_text: This gaming chair is designed for everyone who uses computers for long time , looks very nice and cool, easy for set up, only take about 20 minutes for do the whole thing. I like this white color, and is very comfortable to sit on it. Highly recommended this chair!!

reviews.title: Great chair
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my son for Christmas and he was so excited once it was all put together and he realized what an upgrade it was from his last chair. Great size, great quality, looks good and is comfortable. The foot stool option is nice and easy to use, and the vibrating back pillow is just extra for the gamer. Takes a little bit of time to put together but is easy to do.

reviews.title: Age limits
reviews.review_text: It's a great chair , built for bigger kids of age .. not my 11 year old .

reviews.title: Love
reviews.review_text: Love it, I'm tall so I wish the foot rest came out more, but overall, it's great.

reviews.title: Scammed
reviews.review_text: Received these items in the box instead of what I ordered.

reviews.title: Good chair for the price
reviews.review_text: Easy to put together and comfortable.

reviews.title: Love this chair
reviews.review_text: It has great quality and is very sturdy I love the feel of it as well.

reviews.title: Great chair
reviews.review_text: My boys love this chair. It is super comfortable and has awesome features.

reviews.title: Very nice chair
